What do you mean by that?\""},{"lineNumber":171802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へんっ、あの方には一人の情夫がいたのよ。魔人のな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, that person had a lover. Oh, of course I was!\""},{"lineNumber":171815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だがなぁ……魔人である俺は魔王には逆らえねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you see... as a demon, I can't go against the Demon King..."},{"lineNumber":171816,"originalJapaneseLine":"　渋々でも、従わなくっちゃいけねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to obey, even if reluctantly...\""},{"lineNumber":171817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんないけすかねぇ魔王も全くの無能じゃねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That disgusting Demon King is not totally incompetent..."},{"lineNumber":171818,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一つだけ俺様に面白いことを気づかせてくれたんだからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"He made me realize one interesting thing.\""},{"lineNumber":171819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、聞きてぇか？　聞きてぇだろう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, wanna hear it? You wanna hear it, right?\""},{"lineNumber":171820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはな、魔王を殺した奴は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s this: whoever kills the Demon King,"},{"lineNumber":171821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次の魔王になれる、ってことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"becomes the next Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":171822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのことに気づいて考えりゃあ、確かに歴代魔王の内、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I realized that and thought about it, certainly among the past Demon Kings,"},{"lineNumber":171823,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アベルもガイも魔王を倒してその血を浴びていた」","translatedEnglishLine":"both Abel and Guy had defeated Demon Kings and bathed in their blood.\""},{"lineNumber":171824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気づいたときは笑いが止まらなかったぜぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I noticed that, I couldn’t stop laughing..."},{"lineNumber":171825,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クク、今の強くなった俺様なら、って希望があるんだからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, I have hope now because I’m stronger than before.\""},{"lineNumber":171826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と言っても……魔王ガイを殺すことは不可能だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That said... killing Demon King Guy is impossible..."},{"lineNumber":171827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様が強いと言っても相手が魔王じゃ勝てる見込みがねえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if I’m strong, the opponent is the Demon King, so there’s no chance of winning.\""},{"lineNumber":171828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それなら……また耐えるしかねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In that case... I just have to endure again.\""},{"lineNumber":171829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「耐えるってのは大事だぜ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Endurance is important,"},{"lineNumber":171830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺は自分の人生でそれを何度も考えた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve thought about that many times in my life.\""},{"lineNumber":171831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「耐えてさえいれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As long as you endure,"},{"lineNumber":171832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつかきっとチャンスが来る」","translatedEnglishLine":"surely a chance will come someday.\""},{"lineNumber":171833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「既に数千年待ったんだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ve already waited several thousand years,"},{"lineNumber":171834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これから先、いくらでも耐えてやるぜ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and from now on, I’ll endure as much as I have to...\""},{"lineNumber":171835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チャンスが来るまで、な」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Until that chance comes.\""},{"lineNumber":171836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……！　なんだこれは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...! What is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":171837,"originalJapaneseLine":"また、恐瘴気が今までよりも一段濃くなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Once again, the terrifying miasma grew even thicker than feel strangely... aware of my surroundings...\""},{"lineNumber":171845,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐瘴気の効果で、サテラは恐怖心を煽られていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to the effect of the terrifying miasma, Satella’s now...\""},{"lineNumber":171858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着け馬鹿者！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Calm down, fools!\""},{"lineNumber":171859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、きゃんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, kyaaan!\""},{"lineNumber":171860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よく見ろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Look closely."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　どういう意味かって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What do you mean by that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へんっ、あの方には一人の情夫がいたのよ。魔人のな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, that person had a lover. A demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その魔人はよりにもよって、あの魔王ジルを裏切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That demon, of all things, betrayed that Demon King Jill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺し……自分が新たな魔王に成り代わりやがった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: killed him... and replaced him as the new Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王、ガイ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King, Guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代最低の魔王だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was the worst Demon King in history..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、シャリエラ、最近の人間は勘違いしてやがるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen, Shariera, humans these days are mistaken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々人間ってのは俺達魔物の玩具なんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because humans were originally just toys for us demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「玩具じゃけりゃ奴隷、とにかく俺達高貴な魔物が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not toys, then slaves; anyway, we noble demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日々を便利に過ごしたり、娯楽として使ってやる存在だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exist to be used for convenience in daily life and for our amusement."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間びいきの魔王ガイは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon King Guy, who favored humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな玩具共に自由を与えるとか言いだしやがったのよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: started saying he would give freedom to those toys..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、思い出しても、怒りで頭が沸騰しそうだぜぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even now, remembering it, my head feels like it's boiling with anger..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……不満だったかって？　おお、当然だろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Was I dissatisfied? Oh, of course I was!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがなぁ……魔人である俺は魔王には逆らえねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see... as a demon, I can't go against the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渋々でも、従わなくっちゃいけねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to obey, even if reluctantly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんないけすかねぇ魔王も全くの無能じゃねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That disgusting Demon King is not totally incompetent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ俺様に面白いことを気づかせてくれたんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made me realize one interesting thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、聞きてぇか？　聞きてぇだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, wanna hear it? You wanna hear it, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはな、魔王を殺した奴は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s this: whoever kills the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の魔王になれる、ってことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: becomes the next Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのことに気づいて考えりゃあ、確かに歴代魔王の内、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I realized that and thought about it, certainly among the past Demon Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アベルもガイも魔王を倒してその血を浴びていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both Abel and Guy had defeated Demon Kings and bathed in their blood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気づいたときは笑いが止まらなかったぜぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I noticed that, I couldn’t stop laughing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クク、今の強くなった俺様なら、って希望があるんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I have hope now because I’m stronger than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言っても……魔王ガイを殺すことは不可能だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That said... killing Demon King Guy is impossible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が強いと言っても相手が魔王じゃ勝てる見込みがねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I’m strong, the opponent is the Demon King, so there’s no chance of winning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら……また耐えるしかねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In that case... I just have to endure again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耐えるってのは大事だぜ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Endurance is important,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は自分の人生でそれを何度も考えた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve thought about that many times in my life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耐えてさえいれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as you endure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつかきっとチャンスが来る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: surely a chance will come someday."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に数千年待ったんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve already waited several thousand years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから先、いくらでも耐えてやるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and from now on, I’ll endure as much as I have to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チャンスが来るまで、な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until that chance comes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……！　なんだこれは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh...! What is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、恐瘴気が今までよりも一段濃くなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, the terrifying miasma grew even thicker than before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身に纏わり付く瘴気が、気分を悪くさせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The miasma clinging to the entire body made her feel sick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭の中でひっきりなしに鐘が鳴らされているように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In her head, it felt like a bell was ringing incessantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンガンとした鈍痛が常に続く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a pounding dull ache continued constantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内臓は引っ繰り返されたように、不調を訴え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her internal organs felt twisted and protested in discomfort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛みを叫び、吐き気が止まらなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crying out in pain, with nausea that wouldn’t stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And on top of that—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやに……周りが気になるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel strangely... aware of my surroundings..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気の効果で、サテラは恐怖心を煽られていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the effect of the terrifying miasma, Satella’s fear was being stoked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に背後が気にかかり、今にも目の前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was constantly worried about what was behind her, feeling as if right before her eyes—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが現れるのではと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris might appear at any moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷や汗が背中を伝う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cold sweat trickled down her back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を鼓舞するように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To encourage herself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは口内で小さく舌を打った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella clicked her tongue softly inside her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人であるサテラですらこうである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Satella, a demon, was like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後にいる人間の中には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the humans behind her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歯を小さく鳴らしている者もいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some were also quietly grinding their teeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっ、なんだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, what was that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、今沢山の死体がこちらを見て……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-there are lots of corpses looking this way right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け馬鹿者！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calm down, fools!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、きゃんっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, kyaaan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく見ろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Look closely.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　どういう意味かって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What do you mean by that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へんっ、あの方には一人の情夫がいたのよ。魔人のな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, that person had a lover. A demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その魔人はよりにもよって、あの魔王ジルを裏切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That demon, of all things, betrayed that Demon King Jill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺し……自分が新たな魔王に成り代わりやがった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: killed him... and replaced him as the new Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王、ガイ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King, Guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代最低の魔王だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was the worst Demon King in history..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、シャリエラ、最近の人間は勘違いしてやがるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen, Shariera, humans these days are mistaken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々人間ってのは俺達魔物の玩具なんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because humans were originally just toys for us demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「玩具じゃけりゃ奴隷、とにかく俺達高貴な魔物が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not toys, then slaves; anyway, we noble demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日々を便利に過ごしたり、娯楽として使ってやる存在だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exist to be used for convenience in daily life and for our amusement."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間びいきの魔王ガイは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon King Guy, who favored humans...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな玩具共に自由を与えるとか言いだしやがったのよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: started saying he would give freedom to those toys..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、思い出しても、怒りで頭が沸騰しそうだぜぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even now, remembering it, my head feels like it's boiling with anger..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……不満だったかって？　おお、当然だろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Was I dissatisfied? Oh, of course I was!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがなぁ……魔人である俺は魔王には逆らえねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see... as a demon, I can't go against the Demon King...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渋々でも、従わなくっちゃいけねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to obey, even if reluctantly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんないけすかねぇ魔王も全くの無能じゃねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That disgusting Demon King is not totally incompetent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ俺様に面白いことを気づかせてくれたんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He made me realize one interesting thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、聞きてぇか？　聞きてぇだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, wanna hear it? You wanna hear it, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはな、魔王を殺した奴は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s this: whoever kills the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の魔王になれる、ってことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: becomes the next Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのことに気づいて考えりゃあ、確かに歴代魔王の内、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I realized that and thought about it, certainly among the past Demon Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アベルもガイも魔王を倒してその血を浴びていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both Abel and Guy had defeated Demon Kings and bathed in their blood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気づいたときは笑いが止まらなかったぜぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I noticed that, I couldn’t stop laughing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クク、今の強くなった俺様なら、って希望があるんだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I have hope now because I’m stronger than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言っても……魔王ガイを殺すことは不可能だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That said... killing Demon King Guy is impossible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が強いと言っても相手が魔王じゃ勝てる見込みがねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I’m strong, the opponent is the Demon King, so there’s no chance of winning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら……また耐えるしかねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In that case... I just have to endure again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耐えるってのは大事だぜ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Endurance is important,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は自分の人生でそれを何度も考えた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve thought about that many times in my life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「耐えてさえいれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as you endure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつかきっとチャンスが来る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: surely a chance will come someday."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に数千年待ったんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve already waited several thousand years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから先、いくらでも耐えてやるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and from now on, I’ll endure as much as I have to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チャンスが来るまで、な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until that chance comes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……！　なんだこれは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh...! What is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、恐瘴気が今までよりも一段濃くなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, the terrifying miasma grew even thicker than before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身に纏わり付く瘴気が、気分を悪くさせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The miasma clinging to the entire body made her feel sick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭の中でひっきりなしに鐘が鳴らされているように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In her head, it felt like a bell was ringing incessantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンガンとした鈍痛が常に続く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a pounding dull ache continued constantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内臓は引っ繰り返されたように、不調を訴え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her internal organs felt twisted and protested in discomfort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛みを叫び、吐き気が止まらなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crying out in pain, with nausea that wouldn’t stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And on top of that—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやに……周りが気になるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel strangely... aware of my surroundings..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐瘴気の効果で、サテラは恐怖心を煽られていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the effect of the terrifying miasma, Satella’s fear was being stoked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に背後が気にかかり、今にも目の前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was constantly worried about what was behind her, feeling as if right before her eyes—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが現れるのではと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris might appear at any moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷や汗が背中を伝う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cold sweat trickled down her back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分を鼓舞するように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To encourage herself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは口内で小さく舌を打った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella clicked her tongue softly inside her mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人であるサテラですらこうである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Satella, a demon, was like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後にいる人間の中には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the humans behind her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歯を小さく鳴らしている者もいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some were also quietly grinding their teeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっ、なんだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, what was that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、今沢山の死体がこちらを見て……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-there are lots of corpses looking this way right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け馬鹿者！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calm down, fools!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、きゃんっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, kyaaan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく見ろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Look closely.
